source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

How and where to use detection techniques

What makes a good measure?
Presenting performance data

Work as a professional planning and scheduling engineer
Add value for yourself and your employer.

items.title: Create & Align Your Company Culture For Success
items.headline: Learn to get your team on board, build on your vision, manage change and promote leadership
objectives_summary: Understand culture for small business
Learn to asses your culture and how to manage change
Learn to promote leadership and create a strong team

items.title: Management and Leadership for all levels
items.headline: Business, Management and Leadership Course: Beginner to Advanced level
objectives_summary: Create a new business
Set achievable goals
Set strategies

items.title: How to Be an Effective Executive (Foundational Class)
items.headline: To be an effective executive you must be able to create value for employees and customers. This course will show you how
objectives_summary: How to become an effective executive.
How to build a system map of your organization.
How to look at your organization through a customer lens.

items.title: Fundamentals of Human Resource and Work Culture Management.
items.headline: Organisational Behaviour (KNOW YOUR PEOPLE).
objectives_summary: Foundation Principle of Management .
Universalism of Management.
Organizational behaviour.

items.title: Emotional Intelligence in the Workplace
items.headline: A Step by Step Guide to Developing & Improving Your Emotional Intelligence at Work
objectives_summary: Understand what is emotional intelligence
Learn how to identify and perceive emotions
Use Emotions (Using Emotions to Facilitate Thought)

items.title: Strategic Planning & Deployment (PLAN -DO-CHECK-ACT)
items.headline: LEARN THE STRATEGIC PLANNING AND DEPLOYMENT FROM SCRATCH & HOW TO ALIGN ORGANIZATION IN ACHIEVING ITS VISION & MISSION.

LEADER & LEADERSHIP ROLE
HOSHIN PLANNING

items.title: Seal the Deal: Win Business and Influence Leadership
items.headline: Your coach for how to market your business and easily get the right clients without cold calling!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to seal the deal with new clients and leaders because you will know the 10 core steps and essential mindsets for getting new business and influencing leaders!
You will learn how to simultaneously manage networking, marketing and sales to get the clients you want

items.title: Employee Engagement Training for Managers
items.headline: Learn how you can improve employee engagement on your teams, to improve performance and increase positive outcomes.
objectives_summary: What is employee engagement?
A manager or supervisors role in employee engagement
Signs of a disengaged employee or team

items.title: Course 1: Tom Peters' The Power of Excellence

visible_instructors.title: Tom Peters
visible_instructors.name: Tom
visible_instructors.job_title: Management Guru, Speaker, Author of The Excellence Dividend

items.headline: Excellence Is the Next 5 Minutes
objectives_summary: Create a culture of Excellence in your workplace.
Master actionable skills like how to spend your time as a leader and where to put your focus RIGHT NOW.
Develop Extreme Employee Engagement to improve communication, change attitudes, and make coming to work a pleasure.

items.title: Hotel Revenue Management - A Beginner's Guide to Success
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of financial analysis and pricing strategies to ensure your hotel becomes profitable quickly
objectives_summary: Be an excellent and skillful Revenue Manager
Understand Revenue Management challenges and take steps accordingly
Learn how you can improvise Managerial Decisions and Operational Activities

items.title: Corporate Sustainability Performance, Reporting, & Assurance

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course is intended for those interested in learning about corporate sustainability.
objectives_summary: Explore the basic concepts, theories and standards of corporate sustainability.
Identify the four themes of corporate sustainability: Multiple bottom line, long-term horizons, stakeholder focus, stakeholder value creation.
Identify the five dimensions of sustainability performance: economic, environmental, governance, social and ethical.

items.title: GDPR in 30 minutes

visible_instructors.title: Punit Bhatia
visible_instructors.name: Punit
visible_instructors.job_title: I help you simplify the complex topics

items.headline: Know what you must know about EU General Data Protection Regulation
objectives_summary: You will learn about what is GDPR, why is it needed, and what are the key requriements of GDPR.

items.title: Master Microsoft Teams for Remote Working 2021
items.headline: Learn how to boost your productivity and team leadership skills for the future workspace
objectives_summary: Master the use of Microsoft Teams 2021
Advance your career with remote work best practices
Gain strategies for effective virtual team leadership
